name: Gala Longbraids

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally ATK in all Battles by 25%

skills.name: Brutal Bludgeon
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit ignores 30% of the target's DEF. places a [Shield] buff on this champion for 2 turns. The value of the [Shield] is equal to 20% of the damage inflicted.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%

skills.name: Fearless Aggression
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Ignores 50% of target's DEF when attacking under a [Shield] buff. Heals this champion by 50% of the damage inflicted. places a [Shield] buff on this champion equal to any surplus heal for 3 turns.
Damage based on:[ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.name: Sheer Swagger
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Each hit ignores 25%of the target's DEF. Grants an Extra Turn if this champion has full HP after using this skill
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

faction.name: Dwarves
faction.default_description: Dwarves is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 19 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Dwarves is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description:
Proud and suspicious of outsiders, the Dwarves have long clung to tradition and isolationism. They were once known across Teleria as peerless craftsmen and steadfast warriors, and although these skills have never waned, the hubris of Dwarven royalty ensured that contact with the outside world gradually stopped. Were if not for the occasional mercenary or merchant, their very existence might have been forgotten.
It was only the recent invasion by the demonic legions of Siroth and their undead minions that has opened the eyes of the Dwarven King to grim reality. Through courage, determination, and sacrifice, the unholy horde has eventually been repelled. But the devastation that it wrought was too great to ignore. Now, driven forth by the calls for justice, Dwarves send their greatest heroes to the surface to bring the battle to their hated foe.

seo.description: Gala Longbraids is a epic attack champion from the faction Dwarves doing void damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.
